ACHIEVEMENTS

Professional Achievements:

List awards (e.g., Globee Awards, Claro Judge placements) and significant contributions, such as your Conf42 talk.

Group by year or type (Security, Application Development) to show progression. 

Visuals:

Use award icons or certificates to enhance visual appeal.
